configStructure.name: json
configStructure.description: A textual file containing a JSON object/array

configStructure.name: isType
configStructure.displayName: Should the content be used as a type or as an instance?
configStructure.description: If true the object will be stored among types.

configStructure.name: name
configStructure.displayName: The name of the created object/array
configStructure.description: the unique name that should identify the input
